name: Factory Upgrade
pages: This Upgrade adds the possibility to enter and exit items automatically, from the side configured within the furnace/ forge. Additionally uses the $(l:patchouli:upgrades/autoinput_upgrade)auto-input/$, $(l:patchouli:upgrades/redstone_signal_upgrade)redstone signal/$, and $(l:patchouli:upgrades/autooutput_upgrade)auto-output upgrades/$ in its recipe.
